titleStmt.title: By the King. A proclamation for the adiournement of the Parliament, from the foureteenth day of Nouember next, to the eight day of February following
Proclamations. 1621-10-06
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1603-1625 : James I)
James I, King of England, 1566-1625.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Bonham Norton, and Iohn Bill, printers to the Kings most excellent Maiestie,

notesStmt.note: Dated at end: Royston, the sixt day of October, in the nineteenth yeere of his Maiesties reigne ..
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
